author: stefanegli
msg: SLING-4755 : topology events are now sent asynchronously to avoid being blocked on deactivate due to long-running-listeners. At deactivate pending events are ensured to be flushed.

author: desruisseaux
msg: Documentation: add the (presumed) publication years in reference to ISO 19162 chapter, in case those numbers change in future publications.

author: desruisseaux
msg: Referencing: removed the parameter checks in MathTransformFactory.createFromParameterized(...) since it duplicates the check done by the actual MathTransform implementations.
The check done in createFromParameterized was not efficient anyway, since it was implemented by a copy of all parameter values in an implementation known to perform some checks.
